reviews.review_text: I recently got The Surfer - Mini Vibrator from Smile Makers and WOW!!! It definitely makes ME smile. I can literally take it with me ANYWHERE as it's small yet durable silicone design allows me to carry it in a special pouch in my purse. It is super quiet, too. The people in the next room are not going to hear it and ask what is that sound?. The solid silicone sheath is what allows this to be waterproof for great fun in the shower/bath. Even the charger port is fully covered (feel for a tiny indentation on the bottom side of the vibe, and push the charger post into the indentation. Don't worry, it is designed for it!) And even better, it holds a charge for HOURS even with heavy use. It has 3 speed settings too. I will definitely be keeping this handy for those times when I need to relax and unwind.
